text: (sakāt namæti) dānamānaya nam, diḷindanṭada, duppatunṭada, sakāt ekkāsu karannanṭada, aḷutin islāmaya væḷan̆da gat ayaṭada, vahalūnva nidahas kirīmaṭada, ṇaya baren mirikī siṭina ayaṭada, allāhgē mārgayehi yuddha kaḷa ayaṭada, mægiyanṭada, (ayiti dæya vaśayen) allāh niyama kara æti anivāyadæya yutukamaki. allāh (siyalla) itāmat dænuvatva hā gnānavantayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya
